title: Product Updates: The April 2024 Edition | Similarweb
description: Find out what’s new to the platform in April, and how these updates will get you working more efficiently to scale up your business in 2024 and beyond.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesSimilarweb Product Updates: The April 2024 Edition Updates Similarweb Product Updates: The April 2024 Edition Start your free trial by Leah Messenger , Senior Content Marketing Manager 3 Min. May 7, 2024 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Okay, so before we get into the monthly product updates, let’s just get this out there quickly: Where-has-the-year-gone-already-and-how-are-we-a-quarter-of-the-way-through? Now breathe – may the normal schedule be resumed. Despite this past month being home to April Fool’s Day, there was no fooling around from us in April. We take your experience and your geeking-out-on-data very seriously, so we want to make sure our platform is only getting better and better each month. Here’s what was new in April: SAM: Your AI-powered sales assistant Don’t you wish you had a sales assistant that never needs to take a break? Well now you can with SAM, the ultimate AI sidekick for sales teams. SAM uses Similarweb’s unique Digital Data and AI magic to help you: Craft your outreach messages Research your prospects in seconds Instantly identify data-driven talking points tailored to each prospect Want to join SAM’s closed Beta? Starting now, the SAM beta is open to everyone. Use the form to join the waitlist, and once you’re approved, you will be notified via email. → Request early access Shopper Digest: Monthly insights straight to your inbox Say hello to your new favorite email subscription. Shopper Digest will be keeping you up-to-date with monthly search and sales trends on Amazon, including: Trending keywords Current fastest-growing brands Top-selling brands in your category Once you sign up, it’s super easy to add anyone in your team or organization to the subscription to make sure they’re ahead of the game with you. → Sign up now Amazon keyword performance: More detail, less clutter Also in Shopper Intelligence, you’ll now find a better-than-ever breakdown of Amazon keyword performance, showcasing detailed performance metrics for each and every keyword in your list. Better yet, we’ve added tabs so you can ensure your keyword research is clutter-free. → Try it now Search Tracker: Unlimited tracked searches per campaign Hands up if you want a Search Tracker update? In that case, we’ve got great news. Our Brand Protection and Rank Tracker tools have both been updated so you can have unlimited searches per campaign. That means, within a single campaign, you can track: Unlimited locations Unlimited languages Multiple devices Easily toggle between tabs to compare your performance and keep things organized within one campaign (because we know that can be difficult). → Try out the Rank Tracker → Try out the Brand Protection tool All the frills for April Don’t go thinking that this is just a Spring fling – we’re in it for the long haul with these monthly product updates. We’ve got a ton planned for 2024 and we’re not letting anything slow us down. Stay tuned for May.
